name: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
desc: Flags that define an item’s on-disk properties and its appearance in the user interface.

items.name: static var userReadable: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: The user can read the item.

items.name: static var userWritable: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: The user can modify the item.

items.name: static var userExecutable: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: The user can execute the item.

items.name: static var hidden: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: By default, the system hides the item when the user views the file system.

items.name: static var pathExtensionHidden: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: By default, the system hides the item’s extension when showing its filename.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new file system flag from the provided value.
